mdRecord.dcterms:title: Utilitarian, by Eclipse: Too well and favorably known in this vicinity to need puffing, will stand the ensuing season at Hopewell plantation, 4 miles from Greensboro', on the Withers' Landing road, and at Newbern, the season to commence forthwith, and terminate with the month of July / A. Perkins, Agent for John H. Cocke. .. March 9, 1850
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cocke, John Hartwell, 1780-1866
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Illustration (unsigned) shows a groom holding a bridled, rearing, horse. Text and ill. enclosed within an ornamental border.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Text defective at old fold line at signature for "A. Perkins, Agent." Transferred from Papers of the Cocke family, MSS 6040, Folder 6. (Purchased) Photographic negative, 35-197-E.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Utilitarian (Horse)
Horses--Breeding
Eclipse (Horse : American)
Stallions--Virginia--Fluvanna County
